items.name: DataManager
items.content:
# =================================================================== # # Script: DataManager # # $$COPYRIGHT$$ # # =================================================================== class DataManager ###* * Manages the game's data like loading documents. Documents are stored * in the data folder of the game in JSON format. The UID is used as the file-name. * A document has the following structure:
*
* UID - Unique Identifier
* Items -> An object containing all the items/fields of the document.
* Items.Type -> The type of the document
* Items.Name -> The name of the document
*
* @module gs * @class DataManager * @memberof gs * @constructor ### constructor: -> ###* * Stores all documents by UID. * @property documentsByUid * @type gs.Document[] ### @documentsByUid = {} ###* * Stores all documents. * @property documents * @type gs.Document[] ### @documents = [] ###* * Indiciates if all requested documents are loaded. * @property documentsLoaded * @type boolean ### @documentsLoaded = true ###* * @property events * @type gs.EventEmitter ### @events = new gs.EventEmitter() ###* * Unloads all documents with a specified type. * * @method disposeDocumentsByType * @param {String} type - The document type. ### disposeDocumentsByType: (type) -> i = 0 while i < @documents.length d = @documents[i] if d && d.items && d.items.type == type @documents.remove(d) @documentsByUid[d.uid] = null GS.dataCache[d.uid] = null delete @documentsByUid[d.uid] delete GS.dataCache[d.uid] i--; i++ return null ###* * Gets all documents with a specified type. * * @method getDocumentsByType * @param {String} type - The document type. * @return {gs.Document[]} The documents. ### getDocumentsByType: (type) -> result = [] for uid of @summaries.items summary = @summaries.items[uid] if summary.items? and summary.items.type == type result.push(@getDocument(uid)) return result ###* * Gets the first document with the specified type. * * @method getDocumentByType * @param {String} type - The document type. * @return {gs.Document} The document or null if a document with the specified type doesn't exist. ### getDocumentByType: (type) -> result = null for uid of @summaries.items summary = @summaries.items[uid] if summary.items? and summary.items.type == type result = @getDocument(uid) break return result ###* * Gets a document by its UID. * * @method getDocument * @param {String} uid - The UID of the document to get. * @return {gs.Document} The document or null if a document with the specified UID doesn't exist. ### getDocument: (uid) -> result = @documentsByUid[uid] if not result? gs.Data.load(uid, (dataObject, error) => if !error r = @documentsByUid[dataObject.uid] r.items = dataObject.items; r.loaded = true; ) if @summaries and @summaries.items summary = @summaries.items[uid] if summary result = { uid: uid, items: summary.items, loaded: false } else result = { uid: uid, loaded: false } if result @documentsByUid[uid] = result @documents.push(result) @documentsLoaded = false if uid == "SUMMARIES" then @summaries = result return result ###* * Gets a document by its UID. If the document isn't already loaded this method * only returned document only contains summary data. * * @method getDocumentSummary * @param {String} uid - The UID of the document to get. * @return {gs.Document} The document or null if a document with the specified UID doesn't exist. ### getDocumentSummary: (uid) -> @summaries.items[uid] ###* * Updates the loading process of documents. * * @method update ### update: -> if not @documentsLoaded @documentsLoaded = true for i in [0...@documents.length] if not @documents[i].loaded @documentsLoaded = false break if @documentsLoaded @events.emit("loaded", this) return null window.DataManager = DataManager gs.DataManager = DataManager
